pages.text: The Ritual of Relentless Tides is the inverse of Siphon - it extracts fluid from a tank above and places it into the world below. Create lakes, flood caves, or fill moats with any fluid.

pages.title: Setup
pages.text: $(bold)Tank:$() Place any fluid container directly above the master ritual stone.$(br2)$(bold)Activation:$() 5,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Per Bucket:$() 50 LP (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 32 blocks horizontal, 128 deep (configurable)

pages.title: Behavior
pages.text: $(bold)Placement:$() Places fluid source blocks, letting Minecraft physics handle flow.$(br2)$(bold)Valid Spots:$() Only places in air, replaceable blocks, or flowing fluid of the same type.$(br2)$(bold)Search Pattern:$() Starts directly below, expands outward. Skips already-filled positions.$(br2)$(italic)The tides obey blood's will.$()
